instance_template: frame("Lightweight", 50). frame("Standard", 40). frame("Reinforced", 30). motor("Eco", 60). motor("Standard", 70). motor("HighTorque", 90). battery("SmallCell", 30). battery("MediumCell", 50). battery("LongLife", 80).
generator: 1 { selected_frame(F) : frame(F, EF) } 1. 1 { selected_motor(M) : motor(M, EM) } 1. 1 { selected_battery(B) : battery(B, EB) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: The co-occurrence of a frame designated as Lightweight and a motor classified as HighTorque is strictly prohibited due to structural integrity limitations.
The selection of a LongLife battery necessitates the concurrent selection of a Reinforced frame to accommodate the specific weight and mount requirements.
The operation of a HighTorque motor requires the integration of a LongLife battery to ensure sufficient power delivery.
Any configuration utilizing a SmallCell battery is restricted exclusively to the use of an Eco motor.
The MediumCell battery is incompatible with HighTorque motors, being restricted to Eco or Standard motor types.

global_objective: #maximize { EF,frame : selected_frame(F), frame(F, EF); EM,motor : selected_motor(M), motor(M, EM); EB,battery : selected_battery(B), battery(B, EB) }.
